Reference

All functions

as_mat_luv()

Convert to LUV matrix from HCL data frame

Convert palette-function

S3 classes

Get HCL data

data_surface_hl()

Create HCL data frame for surface

df_hcl()

Create HCL data-frame using HL surface

HCL data frame

LUV matrix

Create LUV palette-function using Bézier spline

pal_luv_rescale() pal_luv_rescale_x() pal_luv_rescale_lum()

Plot surface

rescaler_x() rescaler_lum()

Rescaler functions
